game_description: The ultimate VR goalkeeping experience! Test your reactions, sharpen your reflexes and get an intense workout with our four fast-paced, fun, action-packed games. Simply keep the ball out of the net (if you can). Quickfire Mode The balls just keep coming at you. Endless waves of shots to save in the exhilarating atmosphere of the Cleansheet stadium. Where will you place on our global leaderboard? Set Piece Mode All the excitement of real-life professional football. World-class volleys, headers, free kicks and ultra-realistic shots from all angles. Can you pull off the most spectacular saves and make it all the way from miniature nets to full sized goals? Target Clash A 1v1 competitive game mode where you must pit your throwing skills against an online opponent. Capture as many of the targets on the wall before the timer ends to win the round. Be warned though, your opponent can claim back any targets you control. Goalie Wars Face off against an opponent taking turns to be the shooter or goalkeeper. As a shooter, you have to get creative, using your catapult and environment to deceive your opponent and score goals. As goalkeeper, stop as many shots as you can!
review_1: I absolutely love the game I use it as training when I can’t go outside, I think the graphics are amazing and the mechanics. The game has almost everything you need and multiplayer, there is only one mode I think they should add, creating your own shots and goals. I’ve seen the videos on YouTube that they make and it looks cool and would be awesome to save goals that the professionals couldn’t, once they do that, the game will be perfect and I will no longer ask for anything else (Also we should be able to play other people’s shots too) Thank you for reading and I hope this will be an update soon.
review_2: The Graphics, The contents, It is the best game iv’e tried so far absolutely LOVE IT! 5 star rewiew from me🔥🤩 BUT🍑 There is one thing u should add… and that is a mode where u can Create goals ur self😃, Iv’e seen the vids on yt and i think u should make it a public mode of creating ur own goals, Like you can go to a webside and Create your own goal and you get a code and Then you enter with the code in the game or smth☺️, But every other thing about the game is perfect👏🏻👍🏻
review_3: It’s fun to play and hard I recommend playing with a soft pillow or mattress or play outside it won’t work outside until like 6:30 because the sunlight but it’s still a great game to play also has multiplayer theirs a lot of kids though also please make creating own shots public
review_4: I can’t believe this is the best game I’ve played on vr there is no glitches no lagging and it’s the best goalkeeper game on oculus 😅😅😅😄😄😄👍👍👍☺️ hope you found this helpful
